name: Birthday Splash Bash
description:
Developed by Getting Closer to Retirement Studios

Eliminating your opponents with water guns, in this soaking, wet water gun shootout! You’ll need to spray your opponents three times to eliminate them, all while using the playground to your advantage. Strategically maneuver around the arena in search of water bottles to refill your one-shot blaster! This is sure to be a satisfying elimination party game for everyone.

You need to full screen the game for the best experience. 

This game includes controller support

To enter the game press enter on the keyboard

To restart the game after a win press the b button on the keyboard

To pause the game press escape on your keyboard and to unpause press enter on the keyboard

Keyboard controls (Player 1)

W,S moves forward and backward

A,D rotates the character

E to shoot

(Player 2)

I,K moves forward and backward

J,L rotates the character

O to shoot

Controller controls

Left control stick Up and down moves forward and backward

right control stick Left and Right rotates the character

Right trigger to shoot
